00025 LibraryTreeView::LibraryTreeView(LibraryInterface* handler, 
00026                                                                  LibraryTreeFilter* filter, 
00027                                                                  QWidget *parent):
00028 QTreeView(parent), 
00029 handler_(handler),
00030 filter_(filter),
00031 startPos_(),
00032 dragIndex_(),
00033 openDesignAction_(NULL),
00034 openCompAction_(NULL),
00035 createNewComponentAction_(NULL),
00036 createNewDesignAction_(NULL),
00037 deleteAction_(NULL), 
00038 exportAction_(NULL),  
00039 openBusAction_(NULL),
00040 createBusAction_(NULL),
00041 addSignalsAction_(NULL),
00042 openSystemAction_(NULL),
00043 openPlatformAction_(NULL),
00044 openPFStackAction_(NULL),
00045 openApplicationAction_(NULL),
00046 openEndpointAction_(NULL),
00047 openSWDesignAction_(NULL) {
00048 
00049         Q_ASSERT_X(filter, "LibraryTreeView constructor",
00050                 "Null filter pointer given");
00051 
00052         // the view can be sorted
00053         setSortingEnabled(true);
00054 
00055         // user can select items in the view
00056         setSelectionBehavior(QAbstractItemView::SelectItems);
00057 
00058         // only one item can be selected at a time
00059         setSelectionMode(QAbstractItemView::SingleSelection);
00060 
00061         // Items can not be edited
00062         setEditTriggers(QAbstractItemView::NoEditTriggers);
00063 
00064         setupActions();
00065 
00066         // user can't expand/collapse items in a normal way because the 
00067         // event handler for mouse press events has been reimplemented
00068         setItemsExpandable(false);
00069 }

00075 void LibraryTreeView::contextMenuEvent(QContextMenuEvent* event) {
00076 
00077         Q_ASSERT_X(event, "LibraryTreeView::contextMenuEvent",
00078                         "Invalid event pointer given as parameter");
00079 
00080         // accept the event so it is not passed forwards
00081         event->accept();
00082 
00083         QModelIndex current = currentIndex();
00084 
00085         // if nothing was chosen
00086         if (!current.isValid()) {
00087                 return;
00088         }
00089 
00090         // get original model index so internalPointer can be used
00091         QModelIndex sourceIndex = filter_->mapToSource(current);
00092 
00093         LibraryItem* item = static_cast<LibraryItem*>(sourceIndex.internalPointer());
00094         VLNV* vlnv = item->getVLNV();
00095 
00096         // create a menu to show contextMenu actions
00097         QMenu menu(this);
00098 
00099         bool hierarchical = false;
00100 
00101         // if item can be identified as single item
00102         if (vlnv) {
00103 
00104                 // parse the model
00105                 QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libComp = handler_->getModel(*vlnv);
00106                 if (!libComp) {
00107                         emit errorMessage(tr("Item not found in library"));
00108                         return;
00109                 }
00110 
00111                 // if component
00112                 if (libComp->getVlnv()->getType() == VLNV::COMPONENT) {
00113                         QSharedPointer<Component> component = libComp.staticCast<Component>();
00114 
00115                         // depending on the type of the component
00116                         switch (component->getComponentImplementation()) {
00117                                 case KactusAttribute::KTS_SYS: {
00118                                         menu.addAction(openSystemAction_);
00119                                         break;
00120                                                                                            }
00121                                 case KactusAttribute::KTS_SW: {
00122                                         KactusAttribute::SWType swType = component->getComponentSWType();
00123                                         if (swType == KactusAttribute::KTS_SW_PLATFORM) {
00124                                                 menu.addAction(openPlatformAction_);
00125 
00126                                                 if (component->isHierarchical())
00127                                                         menu.addAction(openPFStackAction_);
00128                                         }
00129 
00130                                         else if (swType == KactusAttribute::KTS_SW_APPLICATION)
00131                                                 menu.addAction(openApplicationAction_);
00132 
00133                                         else if (swType == KactusAttribute::KTS_SW_ENDPOINTS)
00134                                                 menu.addAction(openEndpointAction_);
00135 
00136                     else if (swType == KactusAttribute::KTS_SW_MAPPING)
00137                         menu.addAction(openSWDesignAction_);
00138 
00139                                         break;
00140                                                                                           }
00141                                 default: {
00142                                         if (component->isHierarchical()) {
00143                                                 menu.addAction(openDesignAction_);
00144                                                 hierarchical = true;
00145                                         }
00146 
00147                                         menu.addAction(openCompAction_);
00148                                         menu.addAction(createNewComponentAction_);
00149                                         // if component was not hierarchical then design can be created for it.
00150                                         if (!hierarchical)
00151                                                 menu.addAction(createNewDesignAction_);
00152                                         break;
00153                                                  }
00154                         }               
00155                 }
00156                 else if (libComp->getVlnv()->getType() == VLNV::BUSDEFINITION) {
00157 
00158                         QSharedPointer<BusDefinition> busDef = libComp.staticCast<BusDefinition>();
00159 
00160                         // make sure the bus is for hardware
00161                         if (busDef->getType() == KactusAttribute::KTS_BUSDEF_HW) {
00162                                 menu.addAction(openBusAction_);
00163                                 menu.addAction(addSignalsAction_);
00164                                 menu.addAction(createBusAction_);
00165                         }
00166                 }
00167                 else if (libComp->getVlnv()->getType() == VLNV::ABSTRACTIONDEFINITION) {
00168                         menu.addAction(openBusAction_);
00169                         menu.addAction(createBusAction_);
00170                 }
00171         }
00172 
00173         menu.addAction(exportAction_);
00174         menu.addAction(deleteAction_);
00175 
00176         menu.exec(event->globalPos());
00177 }

00179 void LibraryTreeView::setupActions() {
00180 
00181         openDesignAction_ = new QAction(tr("Open Design"), this);
00182         openDesignAction_->setStatusTip(tr("Open a hierarchical design"));
00183         openDesignAction_->setToolTip(tr("Open a hierarchical design"));
00184         connect(openDesignAction_, SIGNAL(triggered()),
00185                 this, SLOT(onOpenDesign()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00186 
00187         openCompAction_ = new QAction(tr("Open Component"), this);
00188         openCompAction_->setStatusTip(tr("Open component editor"));
00189         openCompAction_->setToolTip(tr("Open component editor"));
00190         connect(openCompAction_, SIGNAL(triggered()),
00191                 this, SLOT(onOpenComponent()), Qt::UniqueConnection);

00231         addSignalsAction_->setToolTip(tr("Add new signal definitions to selected bus"));
00232         connect(addSignalsAction_, SIGNAL(triggered()),
00233                 this, SLOT(onAddSignals()), Qt::UniqueConnection);

00236         openSystemAction_->setStatusTip(tr("Open system for editing"));
00237         openSystemAction_->setToolTip(tr("Open system for editing"));
00238         connect(openSystemAction_, SIGNAL(triggered()),

00272 void LibraryTreeView::onDeleteAction() {        
00273         emit deleteItem(filter_->mapToSource(currentIndex()));
00274 }

00276 void LibraryTreeView::onExportAction() {
00277         emit exportItem(filter_->mapToSource(currentIndex()));

00280 void LibraryTreeView::mouseDoubleClickEvent( QMouseEvent * event ) {
00281         
00282         Q_ASSERT_X(event, "LibraryTreeView::contextMenuEvent",
00283                 "Invalid event pointer given as parameter");
00284 
00285         // accept the event so it is not passed forwards
00286         event->accept();
00287 
00288         QModelIndex current = currentIndex();
00289 
00290         // if nothing was chosen
00291         if (!current.isValid()) {
00292                 return;
00293         }
00294 
00295         emit openComponent(filter_->mapToSource(current));
00296 
00297         // let the default handler process the event
00298         QTreeView::mouseDoubleClickEvent(event);
00299 }
00300 
00301 void LibraryTreeView::mousePressEvent( QMouseEvent *event ) {
00302         
00303         if (event->button() == Qt::LeftButton) {
00304                 startPos_ = event->pos();
00305                 QModelIndex index = indexAt(startPos_);
00306                 dragIndex_ = filter_->mapToSource(index);
00307 
00308                 // if the item is not yet expanded
00309                 if (!isExpanded(index))
00310                         expand(index);
00311                 
00312                 // if item was expanded then close it
00313                 else
00314                         collapse(index);
00315 
00316         }
00317         QTreeView::mousePressEvent(event);
00318 }
00319 
00320 void LibraryTreeView::mouseReleaseEvent( QMouseEvent* event ) {
00321 
00322         // find the clicked index
00323         QModelIndex index = indexAt(event->pos());
00324         if (index.isValid()) {
00325 
00326                 // find the source index
00327                 QModelIndex sourceIndex = filter_->mapToSource(index);
00328                 LibraryItem* item = static_cast<LibraryItem*>(sourceIndex.internalPointer());
00329 
00330                 // if item contains a single vlnv
00331                 VLNV* vlnv = item->getVLNV();
00332                 if (vlnv)
00333                         emit itemSelected(*vlnv);
00334         }
00335 
00336         QTreeView::mouseReleaseEvent(event);
00337 }
00338 
00339 void LibraryTreeView::mouseMoveEvent( QMouseEvent *event ) {
00340         // if left mouse button is pressed down
00341         if (event->buttons() & Qt::LeftButton) {
00342 
00343                 // calculate the distance of the drag
00344                 int distance = (event->pos() - startPos_).manhattanLength();
00345 
00346                 // make sure the drag distance is large enough to start the drag
00347                 if (distance >= QApplication::startDragDistance()) {
00348                         emit dragInitiated(dragIndex_);
00349                 }
00350         }
00351         QTreeView::mouseMoveEvent(event);
00352 }
00353 
00354 void LibraryTreeView::setCurrentIndex( const QModelIndex& index ) {
00355 
00356         // expand the tree to full length all the way from the root
00357         expand(index.parent().parent().parent().parent());
00358         expand(index.parent().parent().parent());
00359         expand(index.parent().parent());
00360         expand(index.parent());
00361         expand(index);
00362 
00363         // use the default implementation
00364         QTreeView::setCurrentIndex(index);
00365 }
